website_summaries.verdict: This stove-style design heats up the room and looks great doing it.
pros: 5,200 BTU heater warms up to 1,000 square feet
Patent-pending 3D flame effect with adjustable color, brightness, speed
Infrared quartz heat helps maintain natural humidity
Light, easy to move from room to room
Puts off a lot of heat but doesn't get hot to the touch
cons: Remote does not allow you to change heat settings

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER FOUR MONTHS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater in January. It had a nice imitation fireplace and put out enough heat to keep my living room warm. My problem is that it completely stopped working after only four months of use. No warning or anything. Just will not turn on. Then I check my return information and it tells me that my return window ended after only 30 days and my product support ended after only 60 days. There have been a lot of reviews on this product and most have been good. Maybe I got a lemon, but now it looks like I'm stuck with a heater that doesn't work and no support from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you like disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product DID heat a huge basement room. This heater DID work great and was safe around my kids. However, this unit DID quit working after less than 30 days. I loved this heater, it seemed to be a huge win with the price and quality. The customer service is really pathetic. Don’t bother with this product and keep hunting for something that has proven longevity. Or just be prepared for a let down in the future. Also, I only had it on for about 4-10 hrs a week
customer_reviews.author: alisa schmidt

customer_reviews.title: It's a heater, so where's the heat?
customer_reviews.text: Where's the heat? I keep thinking something must be wrong. Received today,assembled it in my living room. I had it on max setting for two hours... I sat 6 feet away...MY SON SAT 18 inches away... still felt no warmth. Standing almost on top of it feels like only the warmth of a light bulb. I'm disappointed and cold.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Are you there Heat? It's me Consumer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my basement and left it on for 2 hours. All of 3 feet in front of it was warm. Didn't do anything. I bought it specifically for the 1000ft capability but apparently it's only 10ft. Planning on returning it and buying 3x 1200ft towers I found at Aubuchons for a third of the price each..
customer_reviews.author: Travis J

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fireplace for us!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she totally loves it. No, she's CRAZY about it! Sure, I like it too, but she spends much more time around it...probably because she's a pyromaniac. I can't think of anything negative other than it came with a little dent in the top, but she didn't want to return it...so check yours out closely after unpacking it. There are MANY manufacturers and MANY models from each manufacturer and after hours of researching, we both picked this unit it...I was trying to surprise her and finally decided on this model and the next day she emailed me after hours of research and said that this is the model she wanted!
customer_reviews.author: thegman

customer_reviews.title: Flames are Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a chilly morning! We live in the high desert and bought a home without a wood burning stove or fireplace! We have a whole house heater, but weekend mornings sitting in our sunroom looking at the mountains we can enjoy a fire because of this little beauty! We bought the recommended fire crackle sound device and what a pair! Very easy to use! So realistic looking! The outside casing hardly gets warm at all! Making it safe too! We’ve seen other heaters that look like wood burning stoves for 10X this price and we wouldn’t trade our Duraflame purchase for any one of them. It’s just what we wamted and looks so much better than we expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kari A. Gould

customer_reviews.title: The light effect creates a nice ambiance and runs very quietly
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a variety of electric stoves and this one is by far the nicest! The light effect creates a nice ambiance and runs very quietly. The controls (including remote) are easy to use. The thermostat and timer settings have been accurate. The fire is not super bright, so I tend not to use the dimmer settings. The design is quaint and the cinnamon color looks beautiful with our bedroom decor. This is a good looking, affordable, and very safe (it never gets hot to the touch) alternative to a wood or gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi826

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Scratching Sound... Defective Unit?
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this. I wanted to screw the legs in, plug it in, and use it for years. I just received it today and I think there is defective flame generator motor drive. It makes an annoying scratching sound when the flame is on because the plastic reflectors are scratching internal components. Returning this item immediately but want to replace it with a non-defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Family A.

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s love....
customer_reviews.text: After waiting a short spell for this electric stove heater to be restocked, it was delivered 2 days ago. Very easy setup (just screw on some legs, add batteries to remote, and plug in really). Flames look realistic and adjustable. My living room has been nicely heated, although I think think the 1000 square ft it’s suppose to heat may be a stretch. It heats adequately for what we bought it for. The fan noise that some have complained about is noticeable, but not loud enough for us to complain. It’s more like white noise after awhile. Definitely better looking than your typical electric heater. Will be buying another for a different room at some point!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly  Peterson

customer_reviews.title: For a space heater, OMG. AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by watching one of the review videos. I was really skeptical, but bought it anyway. This thing is beautiful. I did my own video as well. I also used a bluetooth speaker and downloaded crackling fire audio from amazon music and WALAH!!! Perfect! I am so pleased with this, it exceeded my expectations exponentially!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tana Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Decent size. Some heat. Thought glow would reflect ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent size. Some heat. Thought glow would reflect off walls/ cast some light in the room (like a real fireplace). It doesn't. 5 settings but might as well just be one - minimal difference between settings. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: ... this Duraflame Fireplace yesterday and we couldn't be more pleased. It is very well built and is so ...
customer_reviews.text: We received this Duraflame Fireplace yesterday and we couldn't be more pleased. It is very well built and is so realistic! We use our Alexa to play fireplace sounds and you would think you were sitting in front of a real fire! The color is lovely and the product is exactly as described. We would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Closest thing to a real fire
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to put in our playroom fireplace. It delivered quickly and works great. The fire looks better than any I have seen. The heat is decent but probably not as a sole source, mainly for taking the chill off. I don’t understand all the complaints on the remote. I set mine at 70 and it remains set when I turn it off and on. I haven’t had to open the door since I set it the first time. Works great, looks real, priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: No Manual
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived without a user manual - no instructions at all. The feet don't connect to the base.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Ethier

customer_reviews.title: Best to buy a 220 heater more efficient
customer_reviews.text: Uses too much electricity. Best to buy a 220 heater more efficient. Light looks good that's about it. And looks like real flames.
customer_reviews.author: J. adames

customer_reviews.title: Was decent initially but... BAD smells
customer_reviews.text: We've had this fireplace for ~4 months. For the past week or so, when we turn it on, we seem to have about a 70% chance that it will start emitting a nasty chemical smell. At first I thought something had gotten sucked inside and stuck on the heating element but there is nothing in there. Also it comes and goes which wouldn't happen with an outside contaminant. My wife is calling the company to see if they can replace the unit or something because, being unable to use it without a stink, this is absolutely not worth what we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: gNerdLabs

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace failed less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: At first this was a great heater. Unfortunately the plug melted and stopped working within 5 months. We kept it at 68 degrees but seems this unit didn’t have the stamina. It's to bad because we really like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and annoying
customer_reviews.text: The flame effect is very noisy as seen in my video
customer_reviews.author: Operator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little heater
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little heater. We know have 3 of them in the house in various locations. We don't even need a furnace now with these 3. We rarely have all 3 going on at once. Heats our 1600 sq ft house. We figured out if you leave one on 24/7 for 1 month our electric bill goes up nearly exactly $50 for each one. The flames are cool and pretty but not exactly as a fireplace flame because we have a fireplace and its flames are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not "Safer"...
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISING! Beware, this model does not have the Safer Plug as advised. I purchased this trusting the description listed on Amazon, but when received there was no evidence of it having the Safer Plug so we called Duraflame directly. They started that none of the models listed on Amazon have the Safer Plug. If you are buy this heater with this safety feature in mind, save yourself the time and find it somewhere else. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: ABL

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The installation was a breeze and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The installation was a breeze and it looks and works great. I purchased the smaller version to try it and bought le larger one for another part of the house. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good to go, not amazing but quite cool.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the fire looks all that realistic but it's as good as it gets. This is a good unit, it has a digital thermostat display, runs quietly, heats well and certainly looks sharp. You really need a real fire to make it look real, this is a practical/safe alternative and adds some charm. I have it in the bathroom for when my wife takes baths; heats the room nicely and adds a nice ambiance, even when not in use! Shipping took over a month though, the waiting isn't fun...especially when you're spoiled with Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Reisman

customer_reviews.title: Great but controls don't light up. Overall happy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great however the controls are useless because u can't hardly see them to make changes. We had to turn on lights. They don't light up like our last one and the remote works well but you can't adjust the temp on it. It's either on or off. You have to manually adjust it on the unit itself. If they woukd fix these issues I would give it 5 stars. Not sure on efficiency, haven't gotten electric bill but I love that it has a 9 hr timer and thermostat and safety power off features to keep u from burning down ur home. We got two of these for our kids rooms and love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Horrible heater
customer_reviews.text: Flames are cool and thought it would add a nice touch to a little bed room. Flames are great but the heater it self sucks. $20 space heater works way better but you won't have the cool flames.Don't buy it to heat. Buy it for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I had to have a remote and something attractive, and this fit the bill. I use it daily and it is beautiful. I purchased it in Ivory. I appreciate being able to set it from 70 to 82 degrees. You can have the light on in the gas logs section or leave it off. The heat blows out from the top of the heater and I like that since I have it by my bed. I looked at many at Lowe’s and Home Depot but I am glad I chose this. I love having someone else deliver it to my front porch also!
customer_reviews.author: steelmagnolia

customer_reviews.title: Good looking stove
customer_reviews.text: Good looking stove. Heating "1000 sq. ft" seems to be a stretch when outdoor temps around 40 degrees, so would not rely on it as sole source of heat. Fan is audible.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heron

customer_reviews.title: Getting loud after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: As with my last fake fireplace, the rod that spins inside is getting loud. I'll take off the back and see if I can find a solution because I really do like this little stove. It's cute and a nice small size. I put mine on a couple brick pavers and everyone loves it! Update 12/16...Really getting loud. Have a physical limitation and can't trouble shoot at this time. :( Also, the price seems to jump all over the place. It can go up and down by $60. Watch closely.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Realistic!
customer_reviews.text: The Duraflame Fireplace is so beautiful! It has many more features than I originally thought. It even has a digital thermostat if you open the door, there are extra controls there to put it at the temperature that you desire. It keeps a large room nice and toasty. It's beauty is such that it really feels tranquil with the flame that resembles a real Fireplace. I am so happy with my choice and I've seen this sold at much higher prices at other places so the value is amazing. No regrets about this purchase what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: DazzlingDame

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just doesn’t make enough heat It heats maybe 1/2 sq feet that they claim
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legs Not Included and Can't Use or Return It. A $188 Lesson?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this here on Amazon and it arrived with no legs. I contacted the manufacturer (Duraflame) directly and its customer service assured me that the legs were on the way. Unfortunately, the legs are manufactured in China and Duraflame later informed me that the legs will no longer arrive. Given that it's now outside of the Amazon return window, I'm stuck with a useless $188 product that Amazon will not take back.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat even a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed! I have a really small room in my home (my office) that I was trying to heat with this heater. (About 150 sq ft room) the room has a vent in the floor for our whole house heat, but it heats poorly as it is an addition. Even being continually on, on high all day, this heater can’t heat the room past 67° F... (this is WITH the additional heat that the in floor house vent provides!) The small electric space heater pictured next to it heats way better and faster. Maybe I got a dud.... its only warm right directly next to the heater. >:(
customer_reviews.author: Brit A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent style and the flames are really realistic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent style and the flames are really realistic. I am not sure about some of the square footage heating in other reports. It keeps me basement at 69 degrees when it is 15 degrees outside. Square footage of area is 800 square feet, setting on 70 degrees. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: smokeyblu

customer_reviews.title: More Decorative than Functional-
customer_reviews.text: Heating element is too small. Just 3 inches longer would produce a better product. Remote/TImer seems to work correctly but certainly is not state of the ark by any imagination and difficult at times - requiring going to the unit to ensure your settings are correct on display....Remote should have the same functions and displays especially at this price. Fire display is actually decent and better than pictured in my opinion. I ordered one for myself thinking I could give more as gifts for the holidays....had to rethink that one. To me this product should run between 49.99-79.99-and would have still offered them a fair profit. THIS PRODUCT IS NOT FOR THE SEEING IMPAIRED.....trust me on this.
customer_reviews.author: MaleOutlook

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, put it together (which consisted of screwing on the legs) turned it on and immediately got an error message E3. Manual says it an overheating code. Had to send it back. Well built, and looked real.. disappointed it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but after the second day of use it makes a horrible loud clicking that only gets louder.
customer_reviews.author: BoSoxBevy

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had gotten one of these sooner
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this electric fireplace. It was purchased for our basement guest room which is large & always cold. This little heater really belts out warmth & everyone has found it to increase the ambience as well. Now guests can read & relax in front of the 'fire', grandkids play on the floor beside it. It has a 180 degree view, adjustable flame intensity. Wish we had gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: OverTheFence

customer_reviews.title: Very limited heating area.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but i am not. I almost want to return it. It does heat up, but does not seem to heat more than a three or four foot area around it. So it is fine is you are going to sit right by it, but not to heat a room.
customer_reviews.author: wisterya

customer_reviews.title: Weak heater
customer_reviews.text: I have another duraflame that literally blows twice as much air as this one does, it’s the same size too. For some reason the heater on this one is weak. I have this in a small room that has no heat and it’s still freezing, all night while it’s on. The other one I bought I have to turn off half way through the night because the room gets so hot. So I am not sure what they did to this one but it’s not half as good as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stock

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! Saving us $$$
customer_reviews.text: This space heater has been a blessing. Our home is about 1,895 sq ft and we have a very open concept in our house. With how cold it's been lately we were running into an issue with our bill for running our heat being outrageously high. Therefor we decided to purchase this item. It works great and looks amazing! The size is perfect, not too big and not too small. It runs really quiet, just a nice soft sound to the room. Easily sleep with it and not noticed when watching t.v. or listening to music. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute heater with great faux flames. The blower is quite and the heat output is substantial. Assembly is super easy, as all there is to do is to attach the legs I would highly recommend this heater. I haven't received my electric bill since using the heater so I'm not sure about what it add to my usage. I feel it can't be any worse than the oil filled heater I had been using previously. I do know that it heats much better than the oil filled heater and looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: deAnna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace works well and looks AMAZING! This is the best looking small space heater I've ever seen. It looks very expensive. The flames look great and I love all the features. The temperature gage is accurate. Love that it comes with a remote. The customer service of the seller was fantastic. The shipping box and fireplace arrived damaged. The seller expedited a new one that arrived in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Dani1031

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Received the heater, turned it on and within one hour the fan (blower) stopped working. The unit then went into safety shut-off mode because it was overheating. Called the company. Customer service is terrible. I followed their directions in taking pictures and jumping through all their hoops. After four days, they still weren't happy with what I sent them. I am returning the unit to Amazon. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute little portable fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my studio apartment. I am a picky interior designer & have to say it is very nice looking. It is nice that it doesn't get hot on top and is easy to move around. If you are looking for something to use for heat it does get hot but not hot enough to replace your furnace.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful! I purchased the cream coloured heater. The faux flame and logs are actually quite realistic. This newer style is not as chunky as the original, and the cut glass effect in the window is very pretty and adds another dimension to the "flames" when lit. Makes my living room feel warm and cozy with out causing air pollution. I do dearly miss having wood burning fires in the fire place, but, those days are long gone and I'd never want to be the cause of someone's asthma attack due to wood burning particulates in the air. So happy with the purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Another Debbie in California

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little heater. We keep it in our three seasons room. Michigan winters can be brutal cold but we can sit in our little room watching the snow are comfortable warm! We are in our 70’s. It was very easy to put the legs on it and move it around!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It you want this for looks and to take up space then buy this, if you want for heating up a room buy something else. This has a safety feature that only goes up to a certain fahrenheit, this doesn't even heat a small room with the door closed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the price and innovation of added warmth and scenery to the home!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I made in 2017. The hearth projects so much warmth in a large living room. The scene of the hearth with logs and lights is so real and makes you feel as if there is a real fireplace on. Be careful not to connect another high energy appliance (T.V. is fine) to not kick the house breaker switch. Read the safety material as to how much electricity is being used in the room. But..other than that, I love this in my home as it keeps it warm and it is beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a couple weeks now & sets under wall tv. Quiet & pleasant to watch. Doesn’t look fake like the others. Warms up my open floor plan 1200 ft common areas of my home nicely. Stays cool to touch. Beveled window adds to ambience & helps “flames” look more real. Downside: It’s a little small, but I just put some nicknacks on it to suffice. Pictures: 1st shows height/size on an 8’ high wall with a 56” tv & wall width above it with just the “flame” option on. 2nd shows the heating element on just above the “flames”.
customer_reviews.author: J W Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Still works perfectly after a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to write a review on this one until I gave it a good chance. I'm not sure what else to add to the pros/cons others have mentioned. I personally enjoy the features of this heater and the fact that it isn't too heavy for my 65 year old mother to move around. All I can add to the reviews is that it is reliable after 1 year. No issues to report. Still happy with my fake fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: FrightenedExBoyfriend

customer_reviews.title: 2nd winter of daily use. Love it still.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a year to write a review for this guy. We hate turning our heat up higher than 60, so we use this in our living room on cold Colorado mornings. We're saving up for an actual stove, but in the meantime this guy is a perfect placeholder. It was -10 this morning and we had this stove on for a few hours and our small place heated right up. I have zero complaints. The ambiance of the flickering flame is super nice during the holidays too. We use this every morning in the winter. The remote is super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It looks real. It works better.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and looks real, as the accompanying picture shows. Better than a wood burning insert, because your heat doesn't go up the chimney. The fan blows heat effectively into the room. The only problem is with my placement, not the unit. The thermostat is in the back of the unit, which I have placed within the fireplace, keeping the thermostat from Sensing the heat in the room. The unit works so well that we bought another unit to place in the fireplace in the kitchen. Only three more fireplaces to go.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel lloyd

customer_reviews.title: I like that the flame effect can be dimmed and even ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to heat a very large master bedroom, and it does the trick. I like that the flame effect can be dimmed and even turned off while the heater is still on, and vice versa. Easily worth the small price tag. The only downside to this heater (a very small downside) is that every now and then it emits an odd odor for whatever reason, but that odor is very short lived and dissipates in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Young

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite Amazon Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the most satisfying of all my Amazon purchases. It replaced a little stove type heater that I’d had for years, that had quit working . This one is a giant leap forward. It heats the space beautifully and maintains a set temperature with a thermostat. The fake fire is pretty convincing with its 3D effect that continues even when the heater isn’t on. It is relatively quiet and the remote has options besides just “on” and “off.” It really makes winter more bearable, even pleasurable. Has a nice, quality feel to it. I have enjoyed having and using it immensely.
customer_reviews.author: D-Ziner

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. The first one came and there were no issues as far as dents or scrapes. At first, the heat wouldn’t go on and I finally found the settings. It heats my huge living room so I got another one for the bedroom. The second one had a small dent in it (which is why I gave 4 stars) but it still works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not good for rooms with high ceilings.
customer_reviews.text: The heater looks very nice and is easy to assemble and operate, but does not deliver as much heat as I expected. We have 10-foot ceilings and in our 400-square-foot living room, it is not able to heat the space. It likely works much better in rooms with lower ceilings, but I wanted to post this for anyone else with high ceiling who may be considering buying this type of heater.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Varga

customer_reviews.title: This is the cutest little fireplace, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I finally bought this, it was in my amazon cart for MONTHS before I finally bought it. It took about 3 seconds to put together (you just have to screw on the legs) and it is a lot lighter than it looks, but it doesn't feel cheap in any way. I love the look of the flames, it really makes the room feel cozy. I don't use it for heat, just for the fire flames, I have forced heat in my house so I just bought it for the looks.
customer_reviews.author: misshattie

customer_reviews.title: Good looking outdoor space heater
customer_reviews.text: This little unit looks great on my screened porch. Will allow use in the fall and spring when it's chilly out. The heat output is not huge in the outdoor space, and relative to the size it's not as "big" as it may seem, but the feaux fireplace design and visual effects that simulate flames on the logs makes it really fun to look at and it's functional enough. If space is a concern, you could get as much heat from a smaller unit or something mounted on the wall or ceiling, but if you have the space for it, this is really good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G. Chapman, Author

customer_reviews.title: This stove is great when it works!
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these stoves two years ago to put in bedrooms that needed extra heat. We loved them. After about six months, two of them started shutting down with an E3 message, which the manual says is for over-heating. We worked with them for quite awhile, re-setting them, letting them sit overnight. By the time I got around to contacting the company about the problem, they were out of warranty. Two of them still work fine, but the other two will only stay on for about five minutes. We have followed all of the instructions to try to fix them, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Loscille

customer_reviews.title: Not very good heat output at all
customer_reviews.text: Not very good heat output at all. I can barely feel it. Aesthetically is very cute and charming, but what's the point if it's not serving the purpose?
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Just Luv It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t received my first electric bill after beginning to use this great little fireplace so can’t say how energy efficient it is yet, but otherwise it is GREAT! The imitation log fire is quite realistic and the fact that the sides have glass as well makes it even prettier. The forced heat shoots a long way and the fan is the quietest I’ve ever had on a heater like this. The thermostat works great as does the flame control. Was able to get it on sale for about $15 off so a great heater for the price. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for aesthetics AND function...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for ambiance and heat for my porch during winter months. It has exceeded my expectations on both counts. It comes fully assembled except for the legs which are attached by 3 small phillips head screws to each leg. The remote is wonderful as are the heat and light controls. It runs quietly without the "buzz" associated with other units. Very realistic as you can see in the attached video. This is the first time I've heard of a "3d" fireplace. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie F.

customer_reviews.title: We love it and so do our dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this product for over a year now and I can’t say enough about it. We have two small Chihuahuas that absolutely adore it! We set up a stool in front of the fire with steps leading up to it and it’s the first place they go to in the morning and after coming in from outside. We didn’t actually buy it for them but it has become theirs LOL. It has settings for flames and Actually puts out some decent heat. We would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Unit With Good Flame Effect
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this unit. The unit itself is handsome, the flame effect is fairly realistic, and it puts out a good amount of heat. We've placed this in front of our real fireplace and use this instead because it is so much less of a hassle than a real fire. Just about every visitor we've had in our home this winter have commented on how good it looks. We initially thought we may move this to other rooms (for example, move to our 4 seasons room when we sit there), but truthfully the unit is fairly heavy, and we've just been content to leave it in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price....but be prepared to lose your lap kitty!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS FIREPLACE! High quality, quiet, great heat output...we loved it so much we actually just ordered a second one for the upstairs. The only drawback is that I have officially lost my lap kitty....I never thought I’d be replaced by a fireplace. I highly recommend this product, even though it’s a kitty snuggle stealer!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Nice "fireplace"!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on several different brands and styles of electric fireplaces. I decided to get this one and so far it has been great. It takes the chill off of a bigger space than we expected. The remote display on the stove is behind the door but that has not been a problem (I can turn off the stove without opening the door) and it would not look good if you could see the display. Hopefully it will work for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking heater but doesn’t heat 1000sq ft. More like 400 sq ft at most. Controls are INSIDE of door, can’t see them without bright light and hard to use. Remote only turns on/off with door closed. Which the door is always closed I had bought to use in bigger space, it only works in area around the stove. Wish fan could be adjusted, that would help.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glass Door and Realistic Flames
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on this one instead of buying a less expensive model and I am glad that I did. The beveled glass door is classy. It produces sufficient heat for my bedroom. I love the remote control since I can turn off the unit from bed and stay warm. The flames are mesmerizing. Winter will be much better because of this little friend.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkies

customer_reviews.title: It looks BEAUTIFUL giving my downstairs area a cozy feeling
customer_reviews.text: This little heater saved me $40 a month in gas heating price. The electricity only went up by $10, so in the end I'm saving a total of $30 a month so far. It looks BEAUTIFUL giving my downstairs area a cozy feeling. I'm able to turn down the thermostat in my house all the way to 61 degrees all day. It warms up my living room, dining room and hallway without the furnace kicking in. Very well built. Great look and super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: A & M Correa

customer_reviews.title: This little electric fireplace surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this little unit. I was seeking a little heat combined with some fireplace-like ambience and got both of those for a reasonable price. I bought it to use in our second living area (where I spend a lot of my leisure time) and did not want to invest in one of the larger units such as they sell at Big Lots. It is surprising to me (because of the small size) how efficiently it heats the room, and the fake flames thing is actually rather comforting. The thermostat functions very well. The flames will continually dance, but the heat output will turn on/shut off based on the thermostat setting. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. JPJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking with good heat output
customer_reviews.text: The fire effect is nice. It looks quite good. The heat output is great. I use it in an outdoor tent that is around 10 X 12. It heats that area very well. Tents are not much for insulation, but with all the flaps closed it gets warm inside. My remote does not set the temperature, but I tend to leave it on the same setting anyway, so that does not matter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Green

customer_reviews.title: Provides perfect cozy ambiance and heat for cold winter!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this heaters ability to heat my living room and my bedroom from it's placement in my living room. Our house relys solely on electric heaters, we live in Texas and recently felt overnight lows in the 20's and this heater kept us toasty! The beveled glass really gives the best illusion of realistic fire. Love how you can operate from panel inside the door, and by remote. Did not impact electric bill drastically either!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother - low quality, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The unit started making squeaks and rattles noises after 1.5 months of use (which was just out of return window). We found out that they were coming from the flame generator. The company promised to send me a replacement unit in April, and since then (and we are almost in September!) they are calling me once a month to reconfirm the shipment address. I've lost any hope to get a replacement by winter. Don't bother - better buy a simple heater without fancy flames, since this is what I got for my money at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Anton K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to watch, great heat
customer_reviews.text: We love this stove. The only, repeat only, thing that could be improved is the on-stove controls. They are at the bottom (away from the heat, which is good) but a little hard to read for those of us with bad backs. And they only light up when touched, And there are no labels to tell which is which until you touch it. You get used to it. And the remote doesn't adjust the temp, only the on-stove button. Other than that, works great in an attached un-insulated porch. Quick, pleasant heat.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks great. The control panel at the bottom of the unit is very disappointing. You basically have to get down on the floor with a flashlight to change settings. At least give us a back-light. I have this in a three season room that is ~ 200 sq. feet. As long as the outside temp is above 25 F it does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The flames and glow are very realistic and are great if you simply just want a little mood lighting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wife and we have it in our master bedroom. Surprisingly it generates a lot of heat which my wife loves. The flames and glow are very realistic and are great if you simply just want a little mood lighting. I love that the display controls are hidden behind the door so it does not look so cheap and electric. The features are great, the auto timer is fantastic and we could not be happier with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these heaters. Assembly was easy. Both units work well. Fire 3D effect is amazing. Throws out infra-red heat a good 10 feet. Takes the chill out of a cold room in moments. Remote control is awesome because I'm generally lazy. Heat unit comes on and off with thermostat. Design adds attractiveness to any room. Fire label on electrical plug is alarming.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: My Wood Burning Stove has retired
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one and was convinced that if I purchased a second one I could eliminate using our wood burning stove. The space is 1,000 sq.ft. and they more than heat the area. I no longer need to buy cords of wood, hauling the wood into the house or clean up the mess. I am so impressed with being able to adjust the temps, the cleaner air, and the fact that it doesn't dry out the air. They look really cool and I've turned my wood burning stove into a piece of art as well.
customer_reviews.author: irena kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to use and nice looking fireplace especially with the side panels of glass to enjoy the "flame" from more than one angle. I did not feel like it heated up the whole living room but we have vaulted ceilings. I would say it certainly added a level of warmth. I would imagine if you do not have high ceilings and a smaller area that this would heat very well. My friend has this in her guest room and it is works so well in there. It is temperature controlled and you can just see the flame if you want. That is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: mary snow

customer_reviews.title: Good looking heater that works well
customer_reviews.text: Good heater, looks great in the small living room we have. The only problem that I have found with this is that every once in a while I have to unplug it and plug it back in to get it to turn on. It is almost as if it needs to be reset. Overall, I would recommend it. The 3D flames are a very nice feature. It puts out good heat or just have the “flame” on for the ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our RV. Overall pretty happy with the unit due to it being pretty well built. The heat output isn’t AMAZING, but it’s certainly above average. The display/remote utility is probably its biggest set back. You cannot see the display because it’s covered by the door, which is nice- until you need to use the remote and you can’t actually see what you’re doing unless you go and open the door, which defeats the purpose of having the remote. So, really, the remote is only good for turning it on and off. No big deal I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best electronic fireplace ever.
customer_reviews.text: So I waffled for weeks about getting this. Read all the reviews, watched the videos, put it in my cart and saved it for later. Finally pulled the trigger and I could not be happier that I did. This thing is beautiful. Puts out a nice amount of heat and just looks awesome. We have some seriously cold days and nights and having this running keeps our temp steady and makes the furnace work a little less. Doesn't dry out the air like our forced air furnace does either. Go for it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Page

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Fireplace Heater
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I went with the positive reviews. This is a perfect fireplace heater. No, it is not noisy. If you are noise sensitive, turn off the heater or turn off the flames. There is a low noise with the heater and flames on at the same time. I purchased the Cinnamon. It brightens the bedroom. Just as others stated, the beveled glass give the flames a 3-D effect. Although I have a fireplace, I will use this more and save on the propane. Just went back in and ordered the "crackling flame effect" part and the 70 wood-burning scent packets. What an excellent Christmas present for me. Thank You Amazon and Duraflame!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Boylan

customer_reviews.title: Basically very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived quickly and in perfect shape. It looks very nice off the fire effect when on is very realistic. I have an un-heated basement TV room and this is the best heater I've ever had down there. My only small complaint is the heat controls seem a bit sluggish. I can always get to the temp I want eventually but I may have to futz around for a minute to achieve my goal. Not a big deal really and as noted before I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Engman

customer_reviews.title: Had it for quite a while now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the end of 2018 and we still use it in 2020. Its great for Fall and Spring and it helps a lot in winter. When it's bitter cold we have to use a kerosene heater instead but we are heating the whole 1st floor. If I only had to heat one or two rooms, this would do it. We really like ours. It's the most realistic "flame" I've seen on any of my previous fireplace heaters. It's also outlasted any of our previous heaters. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: April D

customer_reviews.title: Another Winner!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used DuraFlame heaters for every room in my home. This is my 5th heater and I am so pleased with all the features and the beautiful ambiance it creates in my room. Customer service was excellent explaining how to set the temperature to stay the same every time I turn it on. The rep was professional and courteous. I received excellent service shipping promptly and delivered ahead of schedule. A very pleasant shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and great heating without drying out the air.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, has a contemporary yet cottage charm. Love the beveled glass. The kids keep the flames on a lower lighting all night. Love it so much I bought four altogether, blue, red, black, and the cream. The infrared heating keeps the air from drying out. So happy with our purchases. Only concern is that the remote controls aren’t as responsive as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty lover

customer_reviews.title: Doubtful on heating 1000 square feet as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit. Operated as advertised; however I'm not convinced it will heat 1000 sq. Ft. as advertised. We're using it in a 500 sq. ft. bonus room and it will heat it up warm and comfy. I seriously doubt it would heat a room twice this size. It looks very nice and is easy to operate. Definitely would recommend it but keep in mind your square footage.
customer_reviews.author: Kester F Dingus

customer_reviews.title: POOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT WORK WHEN I RECEIVED IT. VERY POOR FACTORY SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best electric wood stove!
customer_reviews.text: This electric wood stove is everything I could want and more. It is beautiful, sturdy, and when using heat very quiet. There is a censor on the outside of the unit so you can use the remote from your couch :) The "flames" all the way down to the lowest setting (embers) are beautiful. My family and I are very happy with this purchase and will be buying a second unit for upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Letta

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived last night and we love it! As many have mentioned, the flames look very realistic. Heats up the room nicely too. It’s that weird time of year when it’s cold in the morning and still very warm in the afternoon, so I haven’t wanted to turn on the central heat yet. This is perfect to put on in the morning while the kids are eating their breakfast. I love my house, but the one thing that always made me sad is that it doesn’t have a fireplace. Now I feel it’s perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the heating, but rotating noise in firebox annoying
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it a couple weeks now. So far I am impressed with the heating capabilities. It keeps my main rooms in an even heat. I had two heat pump mini-splits, and this seems to do a better job than those. The fire and firebox look pretty good for imitation fire. I like the different flame light levels. Whatever rotates in the guts to make the flame, has started making a noise as it turns. So the flames stay off because of the noise. That’s a bit of a disappointment. It’s too big to send back and I need the heat now. Maybe I got a lemon, I dunno. But I am pretty happy with the heating capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Originally came with broken remote, company sent me a replacement. The lighting is beautiful. Unfortunately the replacement remote only turns unit on and off doesn't assist with changing temperature or fan speed. Also right after I purchased the prices dropped significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Truestory

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks! The flames look nice but the heater keeps kicking off. There is no way to run it without the remote. Bull s$!t it can heat anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had a unvented gas heater in the basement which was quite adequate to heat the app 500 - 600 SqFt area. But those heaters add moisture to the air and the temperature controls were not great. I bought this one as a replacement although I had some reservations about its ability to maintain an acceptable temperature based on other reviews. I have found it more than adequate for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Coldfinger  67

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it can make a significant impact on the temp in my living room but I have vaulted ceilings and a stair well to be fair. But it took the chill off sitting about 6ft away. My cat curled up in the chair nearby. He liked it. And I like it. It’s cute and looks way better than a regular old space heater.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Becky M

customer_reviews.title: Super looking and effective heater!
customer_reviews.text: This electric heater does the trick and makes me smile every time I look at it. It keeps my 200 sq.ft. sunroom at a nice even temperature. Sturdy and very decorative as well. My only complaint is that the temperature controls are hard to read but once I found the right setting for the room I never have to change again until the weather is warmer. Quite realistic "fire" - glad I got this model.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Died on day 4
customer_reviews.text: Using in dining room - display for temp and all other settings are dead. Still puts out great heat but it's either on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Electric Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I did not like about this product was the size. It really is the size of a large space heater. I just didn't pay enough attention to the size. BUT it is awesome! It is so cute, with a beautiful beveled door, very high quality. Does what it needs - I just need wish I could find a candle that smells like burning wood and an app that crackles and I will be set. It is really nice quality and remote is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: csabatula

customer_reviews.title: For $138 this is a great value! Yes
customer_reviews.text: For $138 this is a great value! Yes, the controls could be a bit better, but it looks so good and heats well. My boyfriend thinks it's cheesy, but I often get compliments on it at work. The 3D is quite realistic! The most annoying part is only being able to go up by 2 degrees with the temp button, so you have to max it out to 82 then keep clicking and start over in the 60's. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: ChartreuseMint

customer_reviews.title: Design improvement could be helpful
customer_reviews.text: First, the stove does what it is supposed to do; provide heat. My complaint: the door has to be open and one must get down on their knees to change the temperature setting. The user instructions were not helpful, I would even say poor. For a person with decreased mobility and visual deficit, it's a chore. Finally figured it out though. Just thought a future purchaser should be aware.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Cuzick

product_meta.title: Duraflame 3D Infrared Electric Fireplace Stove with Remote Control - Portable Indoor Space Heater - DFI-5010 (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackOn a cold night, warm up to 1,000 square feet with this infrared quartz electric stove. The infrared quartz heat helps to maintain the natural humidity in the air, resulting in comfortable heat that doesn't dry out the room's air. This electric stove features a durable metal body construction with side viewing windows and an operable, beveled glass door. Patent pending 3D flame effect technology offers a layered flame effect to create a truly realistic fire experience with five adjustable brightness settings. The realistic flame effect with a glowing log and ember bed can be operated with or without heat, providing the ambiance of a gentle rolling fire all year long. This stove is easy to assemble and can be operated with the control panel on the unit or with the included remote. Manufactured and distributed by Twin-Star International, Inc., under license from Duraflame, Inc. duraflame, the flame symbol and logo are registered trademarks of Duraflame, Inc.
feature_bullets: 5,200 BTU heater provides supplemental zone heating for up to 1,000 square feet to help you save money
Patent pending 3D flame effect technology features realistic flames that dance on and behind the logs, including five adjustable color, brightness, and speed settings
The infrared quartz heat helps to maintain the natural humidity in the air, resulting in comfortable heat without drying out the room's
Overheat protection, heater will instantly shut off to prevent overheating. Volts : 120. Amps : 12.5
Adjustable, digital thermostat allows you to decide the temperature of your room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,192 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
